title.rendered: ABX Air in Wilmington, Ohio, USA

content.rendered:
ABX Air grew rapidly to become the third-largest airline express company in the United States. ABX Air are a leading provider of air cargo transportation services via our fleet of Boeing 767 freighters. ABX specialize in providing ACMI and CMI services to a variety of customers in the e-commerce and express delivery markets, as well as to the U.S. government.

The airline was established in April 1980. Airborne Express, is a cargo airline headquartered at Wilmington Air Park near the City of Wilmington, Ohio, USA.

ABX Air in Wilmington, Ohio, USA Contact Address, Phone, Email and Website

ABX Air Address: ABX Air, Inc.
145 Hunter Drive
Wilmington, OH 45177

ABX Air Phone: 937-382-5591

Email: marketing@abxair.com

ABX Air Official website: www.abxair.com/

ABX Air Baggage Allowance

View ABX Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Types of Planes / Air craft available with ABX Air

Total fleet: 20

  • Boeing 767-300BDSF
  • Boeing 767-200BDSF

Queries handled by ABX Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the ABX Air in Wilmington, Ohio, USA Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the ABX Air in Wilmington, Ohio, USA: (click on the stars below)
